TopicTitle: (ENDED but please don't delete yet) U.K.S.A.F. F-10_______ Procurement Competetion

Articles.Content: Sorry but You will have to wait and see. It wouldn't be very fair of me to tell a select few people what the next plane is way ahead of time. It would give you Gus a massive advantage.
So we have to guess what it will be. Since you already have a fighter, I think it will either be Ground-Attack or Tactical/Strategic Bomber. Time to fire up the Skunkworks!

Lol Maverick that's just plain ridiculous. Do you really think that Jeb would go along with an idea to construct such a small and slow vehicle? And with no boosters? ridiculous. I will say this about to give you guys some help since you have earned some favor with the UKSAF by being finalists. Is will not be a small aircraft. It will instead be a large commercial jet sized aircraft. That is all I will say for now.
Big plane? Bomber. Strategic. I'm thinking you want at least 10 Mk. 82's, right? You'll want lots of range on it, too. Tell me if I'm on the right track.

I can't tell you that much DMan. What I said before is all you're gonna get. I will add a comment on this thread when I start the next challenge so just favorite this thread so that you guys will all see it.

NEW CHALLENGE!!!! This is the link to the post for it. Best of luck to all of you and I hope you all enter it again. This one had great success and I'm hoping that all of you can bring that along with you for this new one as well! Also DMan your guess was a little off but close lol.

Link to new challenge thread:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/127519-UKSAF-Procurement-Competition?p=2055324#post2055324

Hey guys I just came here to let you all know that a new facebook group has been created for the more military themed KSP creations. Feel free to join and post and and create. Link to the new group:
